extensionAttribute.description: What protocol is being used to connect to the servers. We are assuming that all server connections are the same....
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac:
#!/bin/sh # ## SERVER SHORT CUTS protocol #### Will Pierce #### 2016 07 20 # # What protocol is being used to connect to the servers. # We are assuming that all server connections are the same.... # # Is the Transfer shortcut installed? if [ -f /Users/Shared/Servers/Transfer.app/Contents/Resources/Scripts/main.scpt ]; then status=$(/usr/bin/osascript -e 'set Transfer to load script "/Users/Shared/Servers/Transfer.app/Contents/Resources/Scripts/main.scpt"' -e 'set transferProtocol to serverProtocol of Transfer') else echo Transfer not found status="Shortcut not found" fi echo "<result>$status</result>"
exit 0
